About Me

I am called Khadar, and I am some one who loves get into tech career. I like challenges always expanding my knowledge and skills. This time I am focused develop my skills related Web building.

My Interests

Technology as a whole is dominating every aspects that realited to our lives. For me being a Web Developer or Software Ingineer huge thing and big dream. When you build a web-system/Software that is working, is like seeding a plant and when it is used day-in day-out is actualy like harvesting what you have planted. I have dreams and passion of building webs and systems, that dream ushering me right now to CYF to learn and develop my self, so I to realize that dream.
